name: Endless Dreams Eau de Parfum
about: Fragrance Family:Florals.Scent Type:Warm Florals.Key Notes:Strawberry, Jasmine, Vanilla.Fragrance Description:Endless Dreams begin with strawberries and raspberries so sweet you can almost taste them. It also contains notes of jasmine and peony act as a fragrant lace, apparent yet transparent, while Tahitian vanilla blends with the wild berries and lush flowers for a delicious and enveloping treat..About the Bottle:An oversized bow, perfectly imperfect. The LoveShackFancy perfume bottle references founder Rebecca Hessel Cohenu2019s lifelong love of bows and ribbons with a sculptural bow top that appears tied and tightened by hand. The Happy Thoughts print is a signature design chosen from over 2,000 in the LoveShackFancy print and lace library to decorate the pale purple berry colored bottle, a softly curved antique-inspired vessel carved with scalloping on top and a ring of rope on the bottom. Once finished, its spray top is removable so the bottle can be upcycled as a bud vase..About the Fragrance:A love that blooms in nature and is unafraid of big ideas, big crushes and a big life. Endless Dreams contains notes of addicting vanilla floral entwined with strawberry and raspberry and is inspired by a dream that doesnu2019t end, the sweetest of all. Thee scent was created with love and a fanciful, sweet touch by Gabriela Chelariu..Clean
ingredients: Alcohol Denat., Fragrance (Parfum), Water (Aqua/Eau), Tetrahydroxypropyl Ethylenediamine, Citric Acid, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Benzoate, Benzyl Salicylate, Citral, Citronellol, Geraniol, Hydroxycitronellal, Limonene, Linalool
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent.

shades.shade_name: 2.5 oz / 75 mL eau de parfum spray

reviews.review_title: I WISHED for this to be the one
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This was a blind buy for me.  Seeing this box, I was just simply enamored. This shade of purple is literally my favorite color. The flowers are romantic and artistic. Gold, my second favorite color, framing the sides of the box and making the words shine beautifully.  The bottle is simply beautiful. Something you would want sitting on your shelf, decorating its own little space. Something you want to reach for and use. Honestly, it reminded me of a 1960s Avon bubble bath bottle. Or something similar. It's adorable.  The scents and notes promised, the simple fact of the perfume being named 'Endless Dreams' u2014 my goodness. I wanted this to be my signature scent so badly.  It absolutely breaks my heart that the product itself, the perfume, the precious liquid inside, smells so upsettingly horrid.  It's so artificially sweet and fresh, it gives me a headache, and I'm not the type of person that's sensitive to scents.   It's this sort of intense bathroom air freshener that just slapped you in the face with this awful scent when first installed it.  It's this rare side of the 1990s to 2010s were bad perfumes could be used as smelling salts to wake someone up.   It's this sort of 5 dollar body mist that you got because it only smelled kind of good when it was died down so much.   It's this awfully cheap and fragranced bath bomb that stained your skin and didn't clean you at all, and you had to take a shower afterwards anyways.   It's powdery sweet in the most upsetting and intense way.

The packaging is equally charming, reflecting LoveShackFancy's signature romantic and whimsical aesthetic. Overall, Endless Dreams Eau de Parfum is a delightful addition to any fragrance collection, offering both convenience and a luxurious scent experience.
